Tutorial¶

Running Slidedecker¶

` python run.py `

Editing Slides¶

Navigating to http://localhost:5000/admin will give you the admin interface to Slidedecker. From there, you can add/remove/edit slides as needed.

Presenting Slides¶

Navigating to http://localhost:5000/slides will give you the interface to your slides.
